summary: A small fix for the blocky and over-large dust motes that float down in caves and abandoned forts, etc. This is a higher resolution replacement texture with the dust redrawn at a more realistic scale, while still maintaining the same effect.
descriptionHtml:
Ever notice those enormous, blocky flakes of dust floating down gently in abandoned forts and caves? A small issue, but one that always bugged me. This mod simply fixes that through a higher resolution texture with the dust motes drawn at a drastically reduced scale.

Should not impact performance at all, as the new texture is only 256x256 (up from the default 128x128.)

Enjoy!


== INSTALLATION ==

Place the \"textures\" folder from the archive into your \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder.


== UNINSTALLATION ==

Delete the following files from the \"Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\effects\" folder:

dusttiny.dds
dusttiny_dim.dds
dusttiny_dimmer.dds
author: CptJoker
